variables.docs: This resource returns information about player accounts.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The unique persistent account GUID.

apiDataVariables.name: age
apiDataVariables.docs: The age of the account in seconds.

apiDataVariables.name: name
apiDataVariables.docs: The unique account name with numerical suffix. It is possible that the name change. Do not rely on the name, use id instead.

apiDataVariables.name: world
apiDataVariables.docs: The id of the home world the account is assigned to. Can be resolved against /v2/worlds.

apiDataVariables.name: guilds
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of guild ids assigned to the given account.

apiDataVariables.name: guild_leader
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of guild ids the account is leader of. overlaps with guilds

apiDataVariables.name: created
apiDataVariables.docs: An ISO-8601 standard timestamp of when the account was created.

apiDataVariables.name: access
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of what content this account has access to. Possible values: None-should probably never happen, PlayForFree-has not yet purchased the game, GuildWars2-has purchased the base game, HeartOfThorns-has purchased Heart of Thorns, PathOfFire-has purchased Path of Fire

apiDataVariables.name: commander
apiDataVariables.docs: True if the player has bought a commander tag.

apiDataVariables.name: fractal_level
apiDataVariables.docs: The account's personal fractal reward level. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: daily_ap
apiDataVariables.docs: The daily AP the account has. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: monthly_ap
apiDataVariables.docs: The monthly AP the account has. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: wvw_rank
apiDataVariables.docs: The account's personal wvw rank. Requires the additional progression scope.

variables.docs: This resource returns an account's progress towards all their achievements.

apiDataVariables.name: achievements
apiDataVariables.docs: The full list of current achievement objects

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The achievement id.

apiDataVariables.name: bits
apiDataVariables.docs: This attribute contains an array of numbers, giving more specific information on the progress for the achievement. The meaning of each value varies with each achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: current
apiDataVariables.docs: The player's current progress towards the achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: max
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount needed to complete the achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: done
apiDataVariables.docs: Whether or not the achievement is done.

apiDataVariables.name: repeated
apiDataVariables.docs: The number of times the achievement has been completed if the achievement is repeatable.

apiDataVariables.name: unlocked
apiDataVariables.docs: Whether or not the achievement is unlocked. Note that if this property does not exist, the achievement is unlocked as well.

variables.docs: This resource returns the items stored in a player's vault (not including material storage).

apiDataVariables.name: items
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array of objects, each representing an item slot in the vault. If a slot is empty, it will return null. The amount of slots/bank tabs is implied by the length of the array.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The item id.

apiDataVariables.name: count
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of items in the item stack.

apiDataVariables.name: charges
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of charges remaining on the item.

apiDataVariables.name: skin
apiDataVariables.docs: The skin applied to the item, if it is different from its original. Can be resolved against /v2/skins.

apiDataVariables.name: upgrades
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each rune or signet applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: infusions
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each infusion applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: binding
apiDataVariables.docs: The current binding of the item. Either Account or Character if present.

apiDataVariables.name: bound_to
apiDataVariables.docs: If binding is Character, this field tells which character it is bound to.
